casebody.data:
John HASSAN, petitioner,
v.
Lawrence K. MARKS, Chief Administrative Judge, et al. No. 18-7907. Supreme Court of the United States April 1, 2019.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until April 22, 2019, within which to *1472pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
